Name: Reggatta de Blanc
Ingredients: 30 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered green grapes.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Reggatta de Blanc (White Reggae) was the second, and seminal, album by the English rock band The Police . The album's French name reflects the heavy influence of the country's products in this cocktail and happily, for approval by our naming committee (my missus), most of the ingredients are also decidedly "blanc".
Nutrition: One serving of Reggatta de Blanc contains 187 calories
